name: D.Tube Dark Skin [Outdated]
description: A dark style for the video platform D.Tube
additional_info:
Use without night mode

Credit for image: Vivaldi (Browser)

Known Bugs
-Cant upload image - use URL instead
-Menus blink white when opening
-video upload > advanced > "Power-Up x%" blacks out when checkbox is flipped

22.1.2018 Initial release

24.1.2018
+ added support for channel profiles

25.1.2018
+ added support for video upload page

26.1.2018
+ added option to use own Image and highlight colors
# increased general contrast
# changed highlight of video creator
+ added Style Version to sidebar
+ added some highlights on hover
# fixed "add another account" color

28.1.2018
# search bar placeholder hidden on focus
# fixed color of search suggestings
# added highlight on hover for sidebar links
